mapper.select: select post.id as id , post.user_id as user_id, post.post_title as post_title, post.post_content as post_content, post.create_time as create_time, post.area_id as area_id, post.board_id as board_id, post.participants as participants, post.praises as praises, post.comments as comments, post.ban_comment, post.up, post.secret, type.name as post_type, u.nick_name as nick_name, u.head_image as head_image from test_bbs.t_post post left outer join test_bbs.post_type type on post.post_type=type.id left outer join test_bbs.t_user u on u.id=post.user_id where post.id=#{id};
